roleset.name: providing financial backing

roles.note: Arg3-recipient added in addition to those found in the verb file.

example.name: just arg3
example.text: It makes me cringe that the government are cutting funding for the British people , and yet somehow fund the military to rain clusters of bombs over foreign people !

example.name: with MNR, arg2
example.text: total program funding was stabilized at an average per-pupil funding of $6,474.

example.name: MNR and arg1
example.text: Were they distributed equally on a per-pupil basis, each district would receive $46 per student, approximately the mean per-pupil funding for professional development.3

example.name: MNR and arg3
example.text: The first fairness measure is the overall level of per-pupil funding for each state, as compared with the 50 states.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, 'fund-v.01'. No corresponding VNcls.
